entries.original: e997e007 Merge pull request #2088 from minpeter/feat/hashline-edit-error-hints
entries.translated: 풀 리퀘스트 #2088을 minpeter/feat/hashline-edit-error-hints에서 병합

entries.original: b8257dc5 fix(hashline-edit): tolerate >>> prefix and spaces around # in line refs
entries.translated: 라인 참조 내 `>>>` 접두사 및 `#` 주변 공백 허용

entries.original: 365d863e fix(hashline-edit): use instanceof for hash mismatch error detection
entries.translated: 해시 불일치 오류 감지를 위해 `instanceof` 사용

entries.original: 1785313f fix(hashline-read-enhancer): skip hashifying OpenCode-truncated lines
entries.translated: OpenCode에서 잘린 라인의 해시화 건너뛰기

entries.original: ac962d62 fix(hashline-edit): add same-line operation precedence ordering
entries.translated: 동일 라인 작업 우선순위 순서 추가

entries.original: d61c0f8c fix(hashline-read-enhancer): guard against overwriting error output with success message
entries.translated: 성공 메시지로 오류 출력이 덮어쓰이는 것을 방지

entries.original: a567cd0d fix(hashline-edit): address Oracle review feedback
entries.translated: Oracle 리뷰 피드백 반영

entries.original: 55ad4297 fix(hashline-edit): widen non-numeric prefix detection and remove duplicate try-catch
entries.translated: 숫자가 아닌 접두사 감지 범위 확장 및 중복 `try-catch` 제거

entries.original: c6a69899 fix(hashline-read-enhancer): simplify write tool output to line count summary
entries.translated: 쓰기 도구 출력을 라인 수 요약으로 단순화

entries.original: 2aeb96c3 fix(hashline-edit): improve error messages for invalid LINE#ID references
entries.translated: 잘못된 `LINE#ID` 참조에 대한 오류 메시지 개선

entries.original: 5fd65f29 Merge pull request #2086 from code-yeongyu/refactor/hashline-legacy-cleanup
entries.translated: 풀 리퀘스트 #2086을 code-yeongyu/refactor/hashline-legacy-cleanup에서 병합

entries.original: b03aae57 fix: remove accidentally committed node_modules symlink
entries.translated: 실수로 커밋된 `node_modules` 심볼릭 링크 제거

entries.original: 8c3a0ca2 refactor(hashline-edit): rename legacy operation names in error messages
entries.translated: 오류 메시지 내 레거시 작업 이름 변경

entries.original: 9a2e0f1a refactor(hashline-edit): remove unnecessary barrel re-exports of internal primitives
entries.translated: 내부 프리미티브의 불필요한 배럴 재내보내기 제거

entries.original: d28ebd10 refactor(hashline-edit): remove HASHLINE_LEGACY_REF_PATTERN and legacy ref compat
entries.translated: `HASHLINE_LEGACY_REF_PATTERN` 및 레거시 참조 호환성 제거

entries.original: fb92babe refactor(hashline-edit): remove dead applyInsertBetween function
entries.translated: 사용되지 않는 `applyInsertBetween` 함수 제거

entries.original: 5d30ec80 Merge pull request #2079 from minpeter/feat/hashline-edit-op-schema
entries.translated: 풀 리퀘스트 #2079을 minpeter/feat/hashline-edit-op-schema에서 병합

entries.original: f50f3d3c fix(hashline-edit): clarify LINE#ID placeholder to prevent literal interpretation
entries.translated: 문자 그대로의 해석을 방지하기 위해 `LINE#ID` 플레이스홀더 명확화

entries.original: 833c26ae sisyphus waits for oracle
entries.translated: sisyphus가 oracle 대기 중

entries.original: 60cf2de1 fix(hashline-edit): detect overlapping ranges and prevent false unwrap of blank-line spans
entries.translated: 겹치는 범위 감지 및 빈 줄 범위의 잘못된 언랩 방지

entries.original: c7efe8f0 fix(hashline-edit): preserve intentional whitespace removal in autocorrect
entries.translated: 자동 수정에서 의도적인 공백 제거 유지

entries.original: 54b756c1 refactor(hashline): change content separator from colon to pipe
entries.translated: 콘텐츠 구분자를 콜론에서 파이프로 변경

entries.original: 1cb36277 fix(hashline-read-enhancer): handle inline <content> tag from updated OpenCode read tool
entries.translated: 업데이트된 OpenCode read tool의 인라인 <content> 태그 처리

entries.original: 08b663df refactor(hashline-edit): enforce three-op edit model
entries.translated: Three-op 편집 모델 적용

entries.original: e11c217d fix(tools/background-task): respect block=true even when full_session=true
entries.translated: Full_session=true인 경우에도 block=true 준수

entries.original: 6ec0ff73 refactor(hashline-edit): align tool payload to op/pos/end/lines
entries.translated: 도구 페이로드를 op/pos/end/lines에 맞춤
